name: The White Star Target
description:
All our scarves are manufactured with 100% silk and so have a special shine and are soft and lightweight. Each item is the result of a meticulously laboured project. New models will emerge little by little, once designed and approved for production.
The entire process, from the design to production is completely MADE IN SPAIN.

At the moment two different sizes are available; 1.40 x 1.40 metre and 1.00 x 1.00 metre, each one with its particular touch.
All models are limited editions of 100 units, and so are numbered on a card that accompanies the design.

The packaging has been carefully designed so that you can keep the scarf in perfect condition.

So we hope this is a special item for you should you come across one.

Real colors may be slightly changes from the pictures presented on the web.

name: Customized design
description:
We give life to any idea you have on a scarf. So if would like a personalized scarf, you can place an order. A gift for a wedding, a birthday or any special event that you consider special. An original idea that will not go unnoticed. You can order deluxe invitations for an exclusive party. A hallmark that people will not forget.

Each of the projects is a combination of a strong spirit and rich experiences which are based on customer mission.

If you are interested in this item, you should send an email to info@loforyebra.com to inquire about availability. This article should be ordered minimum three months prior to the end-production date.

The price of this item depends upon each order and thus a personalized pricing will be given for each case.
